description: Harukaze Pop is Doremi`s younger sister. She attends Sonatine Kindergarten for the first half of the series and then moves on to Misora First Elementary School in the latter half. She loves to annoy Doremi. She acts older than her age, and has more responsibility than her older sister. Deep inside, she is still a kid at heart who secretly admires Doremi. Her fairy is Fafa.
name: Harukaze Pop
